Michael: We have come together tonight for the holiest of occasions. There

Eve: Ahem. First of all, I can't believe we're really here. Part of me

always.

I have found a peace and a calm that I didn't know existed. I found it in you. 
Now I promise you that I will be the best husband, best father, the best man
